extracted_entities.name: 1st International Summer School on LLM-based Agents for Software Engineering (LLMA4SE 2025)

details.target_audience: Researchers, PhD students, and professionals interested in LLM and Agentic AI in software engineering
topics: LLM-based agents for software development tasks (e.g., requirements analysis, coding, testing, deployment)
Evaluation and benchmarking of agent-based systems
details.program: Mix of lectures and hands-on workshops by internationally recognized experts
confirmed_speakers: Davide Di Ruscio, Università degli Studi dell'Aquila, Italy
Jie Zhang, King's College London, UK
Antonio García Domínguez, University of York, UK
Jesús M. González Barahona, Universidad Rey Juan Carlos, Spain
Massimo Tisi, IMT Atlantique, Nantes, France
Adela Nedisan Videsjorden, SINTEF Digital, Norway

registration_details.certificate: A certificate of attendance will be provided

details.accommodation_scholarships: Limited number of accommodation scholarships available for students
details.venue: University of Extremadura, Cáceres, Spain - UNESCO World Heritage Site
co_chairs: Prof. Dr. Roberto Rodríguez Echeverría, University of Extremadura, Spain
Prof. Dr. José María Conejero, University of Extremadura, Spain
details.organization: i3Lab by Quercus Software Engineering Group and INTIA
sponsors: Consejería de Economía, Empleo y Transformación Digital, Junta de Extremadura
